Back to Domenico Scarlatti

Domenico Scarlatti

Sonata in G major, K. 91

? · Fadini 52 · Longo 176 · Pestelli 11

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 7' 30"

  • 1. Grave
  • 2. Allegro
  • 3. Grave
  • 4. Allegro

This sonata was likely written for solo instrument and continuo, but can still be played effectively by keyboard alone. The sonata uses figured bass notation that the performer must realise.

Recommended editions

  • Le Pupitre (Heugel) · LP. 32 · Sonates / Volume II · ed. Kenneth Gilbert
  • Ricordi · ER 2750 · Sonate per clavicembalo / 2 · ed. Emilia Fadini

1. Grave

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. Allegro

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2

3. Grave

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 1.5

4. Allegro

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2
